entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
